data.lyric:
[ti:No Sleep]
[ar:Martin Garrix/Bonn]
[al:No Sleep]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]No Sleep (feat. Bonn) - Martin Garrix (马丁·盖瑞斯)/Bonn
[00:03.00]Lyrics by：Martijn Garritsen/Albin Nedler/Kristoffer Fogelmark
[00:06.01]Composed by：Martijn Garritsen/Albin Nedler/Kristoffer Fogelmark
[00:09.01]Summer nights all align
[00:12.72]As we drown in the moonlight
[00:16.45]We collide in plain sight
[00:20.15]Yeah I know we'll be alright
[00:23.91]And we come alive
[00:24.83]We run the night with strangers
[00:27.47]'Cause in the end we're all familiar faces
[00:31.23]We're young and wild enjoy the ride we made it
[00:34.91]We made it
[00:38.16]I don't need no sleep
[00:40.27]'Cause I'm already dreaming already dreaming
[00:45.59]Say you'll never leave because I love the feeling
[00:49.99]I love the feeling
[00:52.03]Find myself awake at night
[00:55.85]See you through my lucid eyes
[00:59.59]Oh I don't need no sleep
[01:02.78]'Cause I'm already dreaming already dreaming
[01:15.65]I don't need no sleep
[01:17.78]'Cause I'm already dreaming
[01:19.99]Already dreaming
[01:38.98]Wide awake no time to waste
[01:42.59]Make a mark on my timeline
[01:46.35]We're safe and sound we come around
[01:50.06]We are dancing the sun down
[01:53.87]And we come alive
[01:54.94]We run the night with strangers
[01:57.42]'Cause in the end we're all familiar faces
[02:01.22]We're young and wild enjoy the ride we made it
[02:05.14]We made it
[02:08.08]I don't need no sleep
[02:10.21]'Cause I'm already dreaming already dreaming
[02:15.52]Say you'll never leave because I love the feeling
[02:20.02]I love the feeling
[02:22.05]Find myself awake at night
[02:25.79]See you through my lucid eyes
[02:29.54]Oh I don't need no sleep
[02:32.67]'Cause I'm already dreaming already dreaming
[02:44.83]Oh I don't need no sleep
[02:47.94]'Cause I'm already dreaming
[02:49.96]Already dreaming
[03:14.28]Oh I don't need no sleep
[03:17.74]'Cause I'm already dreaming
[03:20.06]Already dreaming
data.trans:
[ti:No Sleep]
[ar:Martin Garrix/Bonn]
[al:No Sleep]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.00]//
[00:06.00]//
[00:09.01]仲夏之夜 星光都连成一线
[00:12.72]此刻我们沐浴在这皎洁月光下
[00:16.45]激情就在这一刹那交织碰撞
[00:20.15]是啊 我知道我们会安然无恙的
[00:23.91]我们将焕然重生
[00:24.83]我们将与陌生人一起度过这漫漫长夜
[00:27.47]因为最终我们不再是陌生脸孔
[00:31.23]热血青春的我们就放肆吧 享受这段人生旅程
[00:34.91]我们这段旅程
[00:38.16]我无需安睡入梦
[00:40.27]因为此刻我已经置身梦境
[00:45.59]说你永远会不离不弃吧 因为我喜欢那种感觉
[00:49.99]我喜欢那种感觉
[00:52.03]夜深人静时发现自己仍辗转未眠
[00:55.85]我清澈的眼瞬间将你看透
[00:59.59]噢 我无需安睡入梦
[01:02.78]因为此刻我已经置身梦境
[01:15.65]我无需安睡入梦
[01:17.78]因为我已经置身梦境
[01:19.99]置身梦境
[01:38.98]我完全清醒 不要浪费时间
[01:42.59]在我的行程安排表上做个记号
[01:46.35]我们会安然无恙 我们会恢复理智
[01:50.06]迎着夕阳的余晖尽情热舞吧
[01:53.87]我们将焕然重生
[01:54.94]我们将与陌生人一起度过这漫漫长夜
[01:57.42]因为我们终将熟知彼此
[02:01.22]热血青春的我们就放肆吧 享受这段人生旅程
[02:05.14]我们这段旅程
[02:08.08]我无需安睡入梦
[02:10.21]因为此刻我已经置身梦境
[02:15.52]说你永远会不离不弃吧 因为我喜欢那种感觉
[02:20.02]我喜欢那种感觉
[02:22.05]夜深人静时发现自己仍辗转未眠
[02:25.79]我清澈的眼瞬间将你看透
[02:29.54]噢 我无需安睡入梦
[02:32.67]因为此刻我已经置身梦境
[02:44.83]噢 我无需安睡入梦
[02:47.94]因为我已经置身梦境
[02:49.96]置身梦境
[03:14.28]噢 我无需安睡入梦
[03:17.74]因为我已经置身梦境
[03:20.06]置身梦境
